description: Situated just a stone’s throw from the lakefront, this elegant restaurant boasts an attractive English-style garden, as well as a beautiful outdoor patio and a stylish dining room. Here, talented chef Andrea Costantini has very precise ideas about cuisine, in which he showcases the traditions of Lake Garda and its surrounding region with a creative twist using vegetables from his own kitchen garden and a focus on seasonal ingredients. The two menus (“Tradizione” and “Orto”) can be chosen with either four or eight courses.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Interesting wine list', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
